title: Living Paycheck to Paycheck? Your City Could Be the Culprit
description: More Americans are struggling with rising inflation, and more households, particularly in the Northeast and Midwest, are living paycheck to paycheck.
content:
Investopedia / Photo Illustration by Alice Morgan / Getty Images
 More Americans spend 95% of their income on basic necessities in 2025.
